entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
